solution_line_template: Janice can earn ${daily_earnings} x {days_worked_per_week} = $<<{daily_earnings}*{days_worked_per_week}={weekly_base_earnings}>>{weekly_base_earnings} per week.

She will earn ${overtime_earnings_per_shift} x {num_overtime_shifts} = $<<{overtime_earnings_per_shift}*{num_overtime_shifts}={total_overtime_earnings}>>{total_overtime_earnings} more if she works three overtime shifts.

Therefore, Janice will earn ${weekly_base_earnings} + ${total_overtime_earnings} = $<<{weekly_base_earnings}+{total_overtime_earnings}={total_earnings_this_week}>>{total_earnings_this_week} this week.
